Today in Sutherland, it's a solid 5 ft @ 12s W with light 7 mph WSW winds. Good spots like Melvich and Strathy are clean and working well, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions remain similar with 5 ft @ 12s WNW swell and light 8 mph SSE winds, keeping the surf fun at the same locations. On the day after, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 11s WNW, still offering some playful waves, particularly at Melvich and Strathy. Best: today.
